name: Driving Clean Assistance Program: Clean Cars 4 All
description: Up to $10,000 + $2,000 charge card or $7,500 mobility option for trading in old gas car; includes down payment assistance, financial counseling, and lender referral
fullDescription: The Driving Clean Assistance Program provides comprehensive support for income-qualified Californians to trade in old gas vehicles for clean alternatives, including financial counseling and down payment help.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $10,000 toward clean vehicle purchase
- Additional $2,000 charging/fueling card
- Alternative: $7,500 mobility option (e-bike + transit)
- Down payment assistance
- Financial counseling services
- Lender referrals for financing
howToGetIt:
1. Check income eligibility on DCAP website
2. MUST apply BEFORE trading in your car
3. Vehicle must meet age and emissions requirements
4. Complete application with income documentation
5. Get pre-approved before vehicle purchase
6. Trade in old vehicle and purchase/lease clean vehicle
keywords: DCAP, Clean Cars 4 All, electric vehicle, trade-in, $10000, down payment, financing, low-income
